description: Follows the prevailing market direction using technical indicators.
Captures short- to medium-term price swings, holding positions for days or weeks.
key_notes: Relies on technical analysis and market momentum.

description: Buys and sells within the same trading day to profit from short-term price movements.
key_notes: No overnight risk; requires constant monitoring.

description: Makes many quick trades for small profits, often within minutes.
key_notes: Requires speed, discipline, and low transaction costs.

description: Profits from price differences across markets or exchanges.
key_notes: Needs fast execution and monitoring of multiple markets.
